text: This list is of the Tangible Folk Cultural Properties of Japan in the Prefecture of Ehime. ==National Tangible Folk Cultural Properties== As of 1 July 2015, one property has been designated at a national level. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property !width="10%" align="left" | Municipality !width="10%" align="left" | Ownership !width="30%" 1,444 items || || || |- |} ==Prefectural Tangible Folk Cultural Properties== As of 27 March 2015, eight properties have been designated at a prefectural level. {| class="wikitable sortable" || Matsuyama || Isaniwa Jinja || twenty-two tablets, dating from 1803 to 1937 || 150px || || |- | align="center"|Kotohira Jinja Sangaku Kotohira Jinja sangaku || Ōzu || || one tablet || || || |- |} ==Municipal Tangible Folk Cultural Properties== As of 1 May 2014, a further seventy properties have been designated at a municipal level. ==Registered Tangible Folk Cultural Properties== As of 1 July 2015, zero properties have been registered (as opposed to designated) at a national level. ==See also== * Cultural Properties of Japan * List of Important Tangible Folk Cultural Properties ==References== ==External links== * Cultural Properties in Ehime Prefecture Tangible Folk Cultural Properties Tangible Folk Cultural Properties of Ehime Tangible Folk Cultural Properties of Ehime
title: List of Tangible Folk Cultural Properties of Japan (Ehime)
